Pre-Game Insights: Pittsburgh Pirates starting pitcher Paul Skenes is the only pitcher in baseball history to have a sub-2.20 ERA and 150-plus strikeouts in his first 21 games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pirates have Skenes and young flamethrower Jared Jones as building blocks for the starting rotation, which should anchor down the pitching staff for years to come.
Others: The game will be played on Sunday, September 22, with first pitch at 1:10 p.m. ET. Hunter Greene will start for the Reds after being fresh off the injured list.
